author: stefan90kauw
post_text: February 5, 2013 at 5:48 PM#1Hello,I'd like to create a second cue from a macro.What is the correct syntax to select the 'Create Second Cue' method for storing the next Cue?Thanks guys!

posts.author: stefan90kauw
posts.post_text: February 5, 2013 at 5:48 PM#1Hello,I'd like to create a second cue from a macro.What is the correct syntax to select the 'Create Second Cue' method for storing the next Cue?Thanks guys!

posts.author: bundao
posts.post_text: February 5, 2013 at 7:36 PM#2Use /append or /a for short

posts.author: Skip
posts.post_text: April 19, 2016 at 6:59 PM#3Store sequence 1 at next cue

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: April 20, 2016 at 6:52 PM#4just "store seq 1 /noconfirm" create next cueor "store exec 1 /nc"create a 2nd cue is default behavior

title: Store Methods
